title: Brookfield plans Rs50kcr green push in Andhra Pradesh
description: Brookfield plans to invest over ₹50,000 crore in Andhra Pradesh's renewable energy sector, aiming to add 8.66 GW of wind and solar power. Senior executives met with the state’s chief minister. The initiative, through Brookfield's Evren platform, could significantly boost the region's renewable energy capacity by 2027.
